common.dragDropHere: Drag & drop file here, or click to select

extractPages.title: Extract Pages
extractPages.description: Extract specific pages from your PDF document
extractPages.summary: Pages {{startPage}} to {{endPage}} will be extracted from the PDF into a new document.

removePage.title: Remove Page
removePage.description: Delete a specific page from your PDF document
removePage.summary: Page {{page}} will be removed from the PDF.

merge.title: Merge PDFs
merge.description: Combine 2 PDF files into one document
merge.dragDrop: Drag & drop PDF files here, or click to select

split.title: Split PDF
split.description: Split a PDF document into two parts

errors.uploadFirst: Please upload a PDF file first
errors.splitFailed: Error splitting PDF. Please try again.
errors.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

split.dragDrop: Drag & drop a PDF file here, or click to select

removePage.title: Remove Page
removePage.description: Delete a specific page from your PDF document
removePage.dragDrop: Drag & drop a PDF file here, or click to select

extractPages.title: Extract Pages
extractPages.description: Extract specific pages from your PDF document
extractPages.dragDrop: Drag & drop a PDF file here, or click to select
extractPages.summary: Pages {{startPage}} to {{endPage}} will be extracted from the PDF into a new document

reorderPages.title: Reorder PDF Pages
reorderPages.description: Rearrange the order of pages in your PDF document
reorderPages.instructions: Enter the page numbers in the order you want them to appear in the output PDF. For example, 2,1,4,3 will reorder a 4-page document so that the second page becomes first, the first page becomes second, and so on.
reorderPages.dragDrop: Drag & drop a PDF file here, or click to select

addPassword.title: Add Password
addPassword.description: Encrypt your PDF document with a password
addPassword.dragDrop: Drag & drop a PDF file here, or click to select
addPassword.instructions: The uploaded PDF will be encrypted with the password you provide.

removePassword.title: Remove Password
removePassword.description: Remove password protection from your PDF
removePassword.dragDrop: Drag & drop a PDF file here, or click to select
removePassword.instructions: The uploaded PDF will have its password protection removed.

toImages.title: PDF to Images
toImages.description: Convert each page of your PDF to PNG images
toImages.dragDrop: Drag & drop a PDF file here, or click to select

rotatePages.title: Rotate Pages
rotatePages.description: Rotate specific pages in your PDF document
rotatePages.dragDrop: Drag & drop a PDF file here, or click to select
rotatePages.instructions: Enter page numbers (e.g. 1,3,5) and rotation angle (90, 180, 270)

addWatermark.title: Add Watermark
addWatermark.description: Add a text watermark to every page of PDF
addWatermark.dragDrop: Drag & drop a PDF file here, or click to select
addWatermark.instructions: The watermark will be added to every page of your PDF.

rotate.title: Rotate Pages
rotate.description: Rotate selected pages in your PDF document

toImages.title: PDF to Images
toImages.description: Convert each page of PDF to PNG images
toImages.instructions: Each page of your PDF will be converted to a PNG image and downloaded as a ZIP file.
toImages.dragDrop: Drag & drop a PDF file here, or click to select

merge.title: PDF Merge
merge.description: Combine 2 PDF files into one document

split.description: Split a PDF document into two parts

dashboard.title: PDF Tools
